trans-unit.source: Absolute Grace
trans-unit.target: 绝对美善

trans-unit.resname: USG·1 | Absolute Grace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures gain protection from black.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物获得反黑保护。

trans-unit.source: In pursuit of Urza, the Phyrexians sent countless foul legions into Serra's realm. Though beaten back, they left it tainted with uncleansable evil.
trans-unit.target: 为了追杀克撒，非瑞克西亚派遣了无数的部队潜入撒拉的国度。虽然全数锻羽而归，却以无法清除的邪恶腐坏了它。

trans-unit.source: Absolute Law
trans-unit.target: 绝对规律

trans-unit.source: All creatures gain protection from red.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物获得反红保护。

trans-unit.source: The strength of law is unwavering. It is an iron bar in a world of water.
trans-unit.target: 律法的力量坚定不摇，宛如中流砥柱。

trans-unit.target: 天使的合唱

trans-unit.source: The very young and the very old know best the song the angels sing.
trans-unit.target: 最年幼和最年长的人最能了解天使之歌。

trans-unit.target: 天使信差

trans-unit.source: If only every message were as perfect as its bearers.

trans-unit.target: 消灭所有地或所有生物。以此方式被消灭的生物此回合不可重生。

trans-unit.source: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."
trans-unit.target: 蕾荻安目光闪烁，「那么就走吧，」这天使向撒拉轻蔑地一瞥，「然后把这世界留给那些真正关怀的人。」

trans-unit.target: 反白符文

trans-unit.resname: USG·41 | Rune of Protection: White | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nW Prevent all damage to you from a white source. (Treat further damage from that source normally.)\nCycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: W：为你防止来自一个白色来源的所有伤害。（此来源之后造成的伤害仍正常处理。） 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Sanctum Custodian
trans-unit.target: 圣域监管人

trans-unit.resname: USG·42 | Sanctum Custodian | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Prevent up to 2 damage to a creature or player.
trans-unit.target: T：为一个生物或玩家最多防止2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.
trans-unit.target: 撒拉令他们卫护克撒，直到痊愈为止。他们坚守了整整五年。

trans-unit.source: Sanctum Guardian
trans-unit.target: 圣域守护者

trans-unit.resname: USG·43 | Sanctum Guardian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Prevent all damage to a creature or player from one source. (Treat further damage from that source normally.)
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：为一个生物或玩家防止来自一个来源的所有伤害。（此来源之后造成的伤害仍正常处理。）

trans-unit.source: "Protect our mother in her womb."
trans-unit.target: 「在万物之母的圣体内守卫她。」

trans-unit.source: Seasoned Marshal
trans-unit.target: 经验老道的元帅

trans-unit.resname: USG·44 | Seasoned Marshal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进行攻击，你可以横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.
trans-unit.target: 用兵之道只有两个准则：永不无谋而动，以及绝不仰赖计谋。

trans-unit.source: Serra Avatar
trans-unit.target: 撒拉圣者

trans-unit.resname: USG·45 | Serra Avatar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has power and toughness each equal to your life total.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard, shuffle CARDNAME into owner's library.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你的总生命。 当CARDNAME置入坟墓场时，将CARDNAME洗入拥有者的牌库中。

trans-unit.source: Serra Zealot
trans-unit.target: 撒拉狂信者

trans-unit.resname: USG·46 | Serra Zealot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.source: "The humans are useful in their way, but they must be commanded as the builder commands the stone. Be soft with them, and they will become soft."\n—Radiant, archangel
trans-unit.target: 「人类确实有可用之处，但必须如建屋人使役石头般地掌握他们。温厚以待之，则其亦将易于使唤。」 ～大天使蕾荻安

trans-unit.source: Serra's Embrace
trans-unit.target: 撒拉之拥

trans-unit.resname: USG·47 | Serra's Embrace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying. Attacking does not cause enchanted creature to tap.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+2/+2并获得飞行异能。此生物攻击时不须横置。

trans-unit.source: "Lifted beyond herself, for that battle Brindri was an angel of light and fury."\n—*Song of All*, canto 524
trans-unit.target: 「布蓝德蕾超越了自我，在那场战役中成为代表光明与神怒的天使。」 ～万物之歌，524节

trans-unit.source: Serra's Hymn
trans-unit.target: 撒拉咏赞

trans-unit.resname: USG·48 | Serra's Hymn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on CARDNAME.\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Prevent up to X damage total to any number of creatures and/or players, where X is the number of verse counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个词句指示物。 牺牲CARDNAME：为任意数量的生物和／或玩家防止最多共X点伤害，X为CARDNAME上词句指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Serra's Liturgy
trans-unit.target: 撒拉的祈祷文

trans-unit.resname: USG·49 | Serra's Liturgy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on CARDNAME.\no\nW, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments, where X is the number of verse counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以放置一个词句指示物在CARDNAME上。 W，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭最多X个目标神器和／或结界，X为CARDNAME上词句指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Shimmering Barrier
trans-unit.target: 闪烁护壁

trans-unit.resname: USG·50 | Shimmering Barrier | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Walls cannot attack.)\nFirst strike\nCycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: （墙不能进行攻击。） 先攻 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Silent Attendant
trans-unit.target: 沈静的随员

trans-unit.resname: USG·51 | Silent Attendant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: T：获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The answer to life should never be death; it should always be more life, wrapped tight around us like precious silks."
trans-unit.target: 「生命的意义绝不只是迎接死亡；而在于创造更多的生命，如贵重的丝缎般紧密地缠绕在我们身旁。」

trans-unit.source: Songstitcher
trans-unit.target: 织歌者

trans-unit.source: o1oo\nW Target attacking creature with flying deals no combat damage this turn.
trans-unit.target: 1W：目标具飞行异能，且进行攻击的生物在此回合不能造成战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.
trans-unit.target: 飞鸟之真名即其灵魂中织入的诗歌。

trans-unit.source: Soul Sculptor
trans-unit.target: 灵雕师

trans-unit.resname: USG·53 | Soul Sculptor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o1o\nW, oc\nT: Target creature becomes an enchantment and loses all abilities until a player successfully casts a creature spell.
trans-unit.target: 1W，T：目标生物成为一个结界，并失去所有异能，直到任何玩家成功施放一个生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: Does the stone mimic life, or did it once live?
trans-unit.target: 究竟是岩石拟仿活物，亦或它们曾经活过？

trans-unit.resname: USG·54 | Voice of Grace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Voice of Grace
trans-unit.target: 美善使者

trans-unit.resname: USG·54 | Voice of Grace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from black
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反黑保护

trans-unit.resname: USG·54 | Voice of Grace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Opposite Law is Grace, and Grace must be preserved. If the strands of Grace are unraveled, its design will be lost, and the people with it."\n—*Song of All*, canto 167
trans-unit.target: 「相对于律法的是美善，而美善必须保持完美如恒。若美善之缕有一丝散乱，其本质将不复存，其从众亦将迷失。」 ～万物之歌，167节

trans-unit.resname: USG·55 | Voice of Law | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Voice of Law
trans-unit.target: 律法使者

trans-unit.resname: USG·55 | Voice of Law | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from red
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反红保护

trans-unit.resname: USG·55 | Voice of Law | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Life's balance is as a star: on one point is Law, and Law must be upheld. If the knots of order are loosened, chaos will spill through."\n—*Song of All*, canto 167
trans-unit.target: 「生命之平衡宛若星座；其中一颗星即是律法，而律法需要揭示及维护。若次序之节有些许松动，混乱将会四溢而出。」 ～万物之歌，167节

trans-unit.source: Waylay
trans-unit.target: 拦击

trans-unit.source: Put three Knight tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 2/2 white creatures. Remove them from the game at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 放置三个骑士衍生物进场。将这些衍生物视为2/2的白色生物。回合结束时，将它们移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: "You reek of corruption," spat the knight. "Why are you even here?"
trans-unit.target: 「你散发著堕落的臭味，」骑士轻蔑地说，「你怎可来到这里？」

trans-unit.source: Worship
trans-unit.target: 崇拜

trans-unit.source: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 instead reduces it to 1 if you control a creature.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控任何生物，则所有会使你的总生命降至1以下的伤害，均改为使你的生命降为1。

trans-unit.source: "Believe in the ideal, not the idol."\n—Serra
trans-unit.target: 「信仰你的理念，而不是偶像。」 ～撒拉

trans-unit.source: Academy Researchers
trans-unit.target: 学院研究员

trans-unit.resname: USG·58 | Academy Researchers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may choose an enchant creature card in your hand and put that enchantment into play on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以选择手上一张生物结界牌，并将其放置进场于CARDNAME上。

trans-unit.source: Annul
trans-unit.target: 抹除

trans-unit.source: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标神器或结界咒语。

trans-unit.source: The most effective way to destroy a spell is to ensure it was never cast in the first place.
trans-unit.target: 摧毁一个咒语最有效率的方法，就是根本不要让它有被施放的机会。

trans-unit.source: Arcane Laboratory
trans-unit.target: 奥秘实验室

trans-unit.resname: USG·60 | Arcane Laboratory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player cannot play more than one spell each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每个玩家每回合不能施放一个以上的咒语。

trans-unit.source: It soon became obvious that some experiments were best overseen by fireproof teachers.
trans-unit.target: 大家很快便清楚，某些实验最好有防火老师在旁监督。

trans-unit.source: Attunement
trans-unit.target: 精细调整

trans-unit.source: Return CARDNAME to owner's hand: Draw three cards, then choose and discard four cards.
trans-unit.target: 将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上：抓三张牌，然后选择弃掉四张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The solution can hide for only so long."\n—Urza
trans-unit.target: 「答案再也藏不了多久了。」 ～克撒

trans-unit.resname: USG·62 | Back to Basics | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Back to Basics
trans-unit.target: 反璞归真

trans-unit.resname: USG·62 | Back to Basics | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nonbasic lands do not untap during their controllers' untap phases.
trans-unit.target: 非基本地在其操控者的重置阶段中不可重置。

trans-unit.resname: USG·62 | Back to Basics | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A ruler wears a crown while the rest of us wear hats, but which would you rather have when it's raining?"\n—Barrin, *Principia*
trans-unit.target: 「统治者戴著皇冠，而我们其他人戴著帽子。但当下雨时，你会喜欢戴那一个？」 ～巴林，基本原则

trans-unit.resname: USG·63 | Barrin, Master Wizard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Barrin, Master Wizard
trans-unit.target: 法术大师巴林

trans-unit.resname: USG·63 | Barrin, Master Wizard | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME counts as a Wizard.\no2, Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将CARDNAME视为法术师。 2，牺牲一个永久物：将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: USG·63 | Barrin, Master Wizard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Knowledge is no more expensive than ignorance, and at least as satisfying."\n—Barrin, master wizard
trans-unit.target: 「知识不比无知昂贵，而且同样足以满足自我。」 ～法术大师巴林

trans-unit.source: Catalog
trans-unit.target: 理清

trans-unit.source: Draw two cards, then choose and discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌，之后选择弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Without order comes errors, and errors kill on Tolaria."\n—Barrin, master wizard
trans-unit.target: 「没有秩序引来失误，而失误在陶拉里亚是很要命的。」 ～法术大师巴林

trans-unit.resname: USG·65 | Cloak of Mists | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloak of Mists
trans-unit.target: 迷雾披风

trans-unit.resname: USG·65 | Cloak of Mists | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物不可被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: USG·65 | Cloak of Mists | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All we could lose, we did. All we could keep, we do. And both are shrouded by mists."\n—Barrin, master wizard
trans-unit.target: 「以前我们会失去的，我们都失去了；现在能保住的，我们都保住了。这两者都是因为浓雾。」 ～法术大师巴林

trans-unit.source: Confiscate
trans-unit.target: 没收

trans-unit.source: You control enchanted permanent.
trans-unit.target: 你操控受此结界的永久物。

trans-unit.source: "I don't understand why he works so hard on a device to duplicate a sound so easily made with hand and armpit."\n—Barrin, progress report
trans-unit.target: 「我不了解，为何他这么努力造出一部机器，只为了要发出用手臂或腋窝就能发出的声音。」 ～巴林，进度报告。

trans-unit.source: Coral Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚人鱼

trans-unit.source: It is not unusual for a single family of coral merfolk to spend centuries carefully guiding the growth of the reefs where they make their home.
trans-unit.target: 一整族的珊瑚人鱼花上数世纪来细心引导暗礁生长，以作为筑家的场所，并不是件稀罕的事。

trans-unit.source: Curfew
trans-unit.target: 宵禁

trans-unit.source: Each player chooses a creature he or she controls and returns it to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每位玩家各选择一个他所操控的生物，并将之移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: ". . . But I'm not tired!"
trans-unit.target: 「…但是我一点也不累！」

trans-unit.source: Disruptive Student
trans-unit.target: 捣蛋学生

trans-unit.resname: USG·69 | Disruptive Student | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Counter target spell unless its caster pays an additional o1. Play this ability as an interrupt.
trans-unit.target: T：除非目标咒语的施放者额外支付1，否则反击目标咒语。将此异能视为干涉使用。

trans-unit.source: "Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."\n—Barrin, progress report
trans-unit.target: 「泰菲力是个问题学生。不但上课总是迟到，也不会把时间用在有建设性的事情上。」 ～巴林，进度报告

trans-unit.source: Douse
trans-unit.target: 灭火

trans-unit.source: o1oo\nU Counter target red spell. Play this ability as an interrupt.
trans-unit.target: 1U：反击目标红色咒语。将此异能视为干涉使用。

trans-unit.source: The academy's libraries were protected by fire-prevention spells. Even after the disaster, the books were intact—though forever sealed in time.
trans-unit.target: 学院图书馆都受到防火咒语的保护。即使在灾难后，藏书也都毫发无损～虽然已经永远被封印在时间中。

trans-unit.source: Drifting Djinn
trans-unit.target: 漂游巨灵

trans-unit.resname: USG·71 | Drifting Djinn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flying
During your upkeep, pay o1o
U or sacrifice CARDNAME.
Cycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你的维持阶段中，支付1U否则牺牲CARDNAME。 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Enchantment Alteration
trans-unit.target: 结界转移

trans-unit.resname: USG·72 | Enchantment Alteration | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Move target enchantment from one creature to another or from one land to another. (The enchantment's new target must be legal.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标结界从一个生物移到另一个生物上，或是从一张地移到另一张地上。 （结界的新目标必须合法）

trans-unit.source: Energy Field
trans-unit.target: 能量力场

trans-unit.resname: USG·73 | Energy Field | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage dealt to you from sources you do not control.\nWhen a card is put into your graveyard, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 防止非你所操控之来源对你造成的所有伤害。 当任何牌被置入你的坟墓场，则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Exhaustion
trans-unit.target: 精疲力竭

trans-unit.source: Creatures and lands target opponent controls do not untap during his or her next untap phase.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手所操控的生物与地在他的下一个重置阶段中不可重置。

trans-unit.source: The mage felt as though he'd been in the stasis suit for days. Upon his return, he found it was months.
trans-unit.target: 法术师以为他只在静止状态中停留了几天，但是回来后，却发觉已经过了几个月。

trans-unit.source: Fog Bank
trans-unit.target: 浓雾堤防

trans-unit.resname: USG·75 | Fog Bank | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Walls cannot attack.)\nFlying\nCARDNAME does not deal or receive combat damage.
trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击） 飞行 CARDNAME不会造成也不受到战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: Gilded Drake
trans-unit.target: 金鳞龙兽

trans-unit.resname: USG·76 | Gilded Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, exchange control of CARDNAME for target creature one of your opponents controls or sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，交换CARDNAME与任一对手所操控之目标生物的操控权，否则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Buyer beware.
trans-unit.target: 买家小心。

trans-unit.source: Great Whale
trans-unit.target: 巨鲸

trans-unit.resname: USG·77 | Great Whale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, untap up to seven lands.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，重置最多七张地。

trans-unit.source: "As a great whale dies, it flips onto its back. And so an island is born."\n—Mariners' legend
trans-unit.target: 「巨鲸死时肚皮会朝上，这么一来又有一座新的岛屿了。」 ～水手的传说

trans-unit.source: Hermetic Study
trans-unit.target: 闭门苦读

trans-unit.resname: USG·78 | Hermetic Study | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains "oc\nT: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得「T ：此生物对目标生物或玩家造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.source: "Books can be replaced; a prize student cannot. Be patient."\n—Urza, to Barrin
trans-unit.target: 「书本还有得替代，但有天份的学生却没得替代。有耐心点。」 ～克撒致巴林

trans-unit.source: Hibernation
trans-unit.target: 冬眠

trans-unit.source: Return all green permanents to owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将所有绿色永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: On its way to the cave, the armadillo brushed by a sapling. It awoke to find a full-grown tree blocking its path.
trans-unit.target: 当犰狳回洞的路上，被一棵小树苗刮倒。当它醒来时，它发现有棵大树挡住了它的路。

trans-unit.source: Horseshoe Crab
trans-unit.target: 马蹄蟹

trans-unit.resname: USG·80 | Horseshoe Crab | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nU Untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: U：重置CARDNAME

trans-unit.source: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.
trans-unit.target: 在大灾难发生的前几天，陶拉里亚上所有的螃蟹从河口﹑溪流与池塘奔游入海。但是没有一个人注意到这个异象。

trans-unit.source: Imaginary Pet
trans-unit.target: 虚幻宠物

trans-unit.resname: USG·81 | Imaginary Pet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, if you have a card in hand, return CARDNAME to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，若你有任一张手牌，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "It followed me home. Can I keep it?"
trans-unit.target: 「它跟著我回来。我能留下它吗？」

trans-unit.source: Launch
trans-unit.target: 起飞

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains flying.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, return CARDNAME to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得飞行异能。 当CARDNAME从场上置入任何坟墓场时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.source: Lilting Refrain
trans-unit.target: 轻快的旋律

trans-unit.resname: USG·83 | Lilting Refrain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on CARDNAME.\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Counter target spell unless its caster pays an additional o\nX, where X is the number of verse counters on CARDNAME. Play this ability as an interrupt.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以放置一个词句指示物在CARDNAME上。 牺牲CARDNAME：除非目标咒语的施放者能够额外支付X，否则反击目标咒语。X等于CARDNAME上词句指示物的数量。将此异能视为干涉使用。

trans-unit.source: Lingering Mirage
trans-unit.target: 滞形幻象

trans-unit.resname: USG·84 | Lingering Mirage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchanted land is an island.\nCycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的地成为海岛。 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Birds frozen in flight. Sea turned to glass. Tolaria hidden in a mirror.
trans-unit.target: 飞鸟定于天，大海成玻璃，陶拉里亚藏于镜。

trans-unit.source: Morphling
trans-unit.target: 古灵精怪

trans-unit.source:
oo
U Untap CARDNAME.
oo
U CARDNAME gains flying until end of turn.
oo
U CARDNAME cannot be the target of spells or abilities until end of turn.
o1: CARDNAME gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
o1: CARDNAME gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: U：重置CARDNAME。 U：CARDNAME获得飞行异能直到回合结束 U：CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标直到回合结束。 1：CARDNAME得+1/-1直到回合结束。 1：CARDNAME得-1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Pendrell Drake
trans-unit.target: 潘卓欧龙兽

trans-unit.resname: USG·86 | Pendrell Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: The mages of Tolaria found strange ways to spend their free time. Occasionally they had contests to see whose kite was eaten last.
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚的法术师有个消磨时间的奇特方式。有时候他们会比谁的风筝最晚被吃掉。

trans-unit.source: Pendrell Flux
trans-unit.target: 潘卓欧异变

trans-unit.resname: USG·87 | Pendrell Flux | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gains "During your upkeep, pay this creature's casting cost or sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得「在你的维持阶段中，支付此生物的施放费用，否则牺牲之」

trans-unit.source: Devoured by the mists, Tolaria was stuck in time, trapped between two eternal heartbeats.
trans-unit.target: 被迷雾吞没的陶拉里亚被禁锢在时空中，陷于两种脉动间进退不得。

trans-unit.source: Peregrine Drake
trans-unit.target: 隼龙兽

trans-unit.resname: USG·88 | Peregrine Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, untap up to five lands.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，重置最多五张地。

trans-unit.source: That the Tolarian mists parted for the drakes was warning enough to stay away.
trans-unit.target: 为龙兽所划开的陶拉里亚迷雾，应足以作为生人勿近的警示。

trans-unit.source: Power Sink
trans-unit.target: 能量消沉

trans-unit.resname: USG·89 | Power Sink | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its caster pays an additional o\nX. If he or she does not, tap all mana-producing lands that player controls and remove all mana from his or her mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的施放者能够额外支付X，否则反击目标咒语。若他无法支付X，则横置所有他操控之能产生法术力的地，并且将他法术力池中的所有法术力移除。

trans-unit.source: Power Taint
trans-unit.target: 能量感染

trans-unit.resname: USG·90 | Power Taint | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: During the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player pays o2 or loses 2 life.\nCycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 在受此结界之结界的操控者的维持阶段中，该玩家支付2否则失去2点生命。 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Recantation
trans-unit.target: 改弦易辙

trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, you may put a verse counter on CARDNAME.\no\nU, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return up to X target permanents to owner's hand, where X is the number of verse counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以放置一个词句指示物在CARDNAME上。 U，牺牲CARDNAME：将最多X个目标永久物移回其拥有者手上，X等于CARDNAME上词句指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Rescind
trans-unit.target: 撤除

trans-unit.source: Return target permanent to owner's hand.\nCycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标永久物移回其拥有者的手上。 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Rewind
trans-unit.target: 倒退

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。重置最多四张地。

trans-unit.source: "Time flows like a river. In Tolaria we practice the art of building dams."\n—Barrin, master wizard
trans-unit.target: 「时间就像河流般流动。在陶拉里亚，我们实践的是建筑水坝的艺术。」 ～法术大师巴林

trans-unit.source: Sandbar Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 沙洲人鱼

trans-unit.resname: USG·94 | Sandbar Merfolk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: You are not prey until a predator knows of your existence.
trans-unit.target: 当掠夺者发现了你的存在，你便变成了猎物。

trans-unit.source: Sandbar Serpent
trans-unit.target: 沙洲巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: USG·95 | Sandbar Serpent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Treacherous and unpredictable currents around Tolaria earned the nickname "serpent wakes."
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚周围危险而难以预测的海流，得来了「巨蛇戏浪」的外号。

trans-unit.resname: USG·96 | Show and Tell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Show and Tell
trans-unit.target: 谆谆教诲

trans-unit.resname: USG·96 | Show and Tell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player may choose an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card in his or her hand and put that permanent into play.
trans-unit.target: 每位玩家可以选择手上一张神器牌﹑生物牌﹑结界牌或地牌，再将该永久物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: USG·96 | Show and Tell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."
trans-unit.target: 在学院中，谆谆教诲常会变成躲躲迷藏。

trans-unit.source: Somnophore
trans-unit.target: 瞌睡虫

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME successfully deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature does not untap during its controller's untap phase as long as CARDNAME remains in play.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME成功地对任何玩家造成伤害，则横置该玩家所操控之目标生物。只要CARDNAME持续在场，该生物便不能在其操控者的重置阶段中被重置。

trans-unit.source: Spire Owl
trans-unit.target: 螺塔猫头鹰

trans-unit.resname: USG·98 | Spire Owl | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, look at the top four cards of your library and put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，检视你牌库顶上的四张牌，然后以任意顺序将它们放回。

trans-unit.source: Stern Proctor
trans-unit.target: 正经的督学

trans-unit.resname: USG·99 | Stern Proctor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, return target artifact or enchantment to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将目标神器或结界移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "I preferred the harsh tutors—they made mischief all the more fun."\n—Teferi, third-level student
trans-unit.target: 「我比较喜欢严厉的讲师～他们让我捣起蛋来更带劲。」 ～泰菲力，第三级学生

trans-unit.resname: USG·100 | Stroke of Genius | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stroke of Genius
trans-unit.target: 神来一笔

trans-unit.resname: USG·100 | Stroke of Genius | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws X cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标玩家抓X张牌。

trans-unit.resname: USG·100 | Stroke of Genius | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.
trans-unit.target: 在一百多次实验失败后，克撒惊觉一般的银可以通过时光通道而不受伤害。于是他立刻设计了一个银魔像。

trans-unit.source: Sunder
trans-unit.target: 分裂

trans-unit.source: Return all lands to owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将所有地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: The flow of time was disrupted; like a flooding river it rose from its banks. Tolaria was drowned in an instant that stretched toward infinity.
trans-unit.target: 时间流已被捣乱，就像泛滥的河水淹过堤防。陶拉里亚就这样被淹没在延伸至无垠的瞬间当中。

trans-unit.source: Telepathy
trans-unit.target: 心灵感应

trans-unit.source: Each of your opponents plays with his or her hand revealed.
trans-unit.target: 你的每一个对手须将手牌面朝上地进行游戏。

trans-unit.source: "The most disappointing thing about learning telepathy is finding out how boring people really are."\n—Teferi, fourth-level student
trans-unit.target: 「学习心灵感应时最令人气馁的一件事，就是发现人类实际上有多无聊。」 ～泰菲力，第四级学生

trans-unit.source: Time Spiral
trans-unit.target: 时间漩涡

trans-unit.resname: USG·103 | Time Spiral | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove CARDNAME from the game. Each player shuffles his or her graveyard and hand into his or her library, then draws seven cards. You untap up to six lands.
trans-unit.target: 将CARDNAME移出游戏。每位玩家将其坟墓场与手牌放到牌库中后洗牌，再抓七张牌。你可以重置最多六张地。

trans-unit.source: Tolarian Winds
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚之风

trans-unit.resname: USG·104 | Tolarian Winds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 弃掉你的手牌，然后抓取同样数量的牌。

trans-unit.source: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.
trans-unit.target: 往后，陶拉里亚上的风吹声，就像迷途法术师的耳语，声声都是救命的呼喊。

trans-unit.source: Turnabout
trans-unit.target: 变节

trans-unit.source: Tap or untap all artifacts, creatures, or lands target player controls.
trans-unit.target: 横置或重置目标玩家操控的所有神器﹑生物或地。

trans-unit.source: The best cure for a big ego is a little failure.
trans-unit.target: 对自视甚高的人最好的药方，就是一点小小的失败。

trans-unit.resname: USG·106 | Veil of Birds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Veil of Birds
trans-unit.target: 飞鸟头纱

trans-unit.resname: USG·106 | Veil of Birds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When one of your opponents successfully casts a spell, if CARDNAME is an enchantment, CARDNAME becomes a 1/1 creature with flying that counts as a Bird.
trans-unit.target: 当任一对手成功施放一个咒语，若CARDNAME此时为一结界，则CARDNAME 成为1/1，具飞行异能，并视为鸟的生物。

trans-unit.resname: USG·106 | Veil of Birds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When wind marries sky, even the bride's veil sings her praises.
trans-unit.target: 当微风嫁给蓝天的时候，连新娘的头巾也不禁轻唱赞美。

trans-unit.source: Veiled Apparition
trans-unit.target: 隐匿幻影

trans-unit.resname: USG·107 | Veiled Apparition | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When one of your opponents successfully casts a spell, if CARDNAME is an enchantment, CARDNAME becomes a 3/3 creature with flying and "During your upkeep, pay o1o\nU or sacrifice CARDNAME" and that counts as an Illusion.
trans-unit.target: 当任一对手成功施放一个咒语，若CARDNAME此时为一结界，则CARDNAME成为3/3，具飞行异能与「在你的维持阶段中，支付1U，否则牺牲CARDNAME」，并视为虚影的生物。

trans-unit.source: Veiled Crocodile
trans-unit.target: 隐匿鳄鱼

trans-unit.resname: USG·108 | Veiled Crocodile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When a player has no cards in hand, if CARDNAME is an enchantment, CARDNAME becomes a 4/4 creature that counts as a Crocodile.
trans-unit.target: 当任一玩家没有任一张手牌，若CARDNAME此时为一结界，则CARDNAME成为4/4，并视为鳄鱼的生物。

trans-unit.source: Some roads are paved with bad intentions.
trans-unit.target: 某些路是用恶念舖砌而成。

trans-unit.source: Veiled Sentry
trans-unit.target: 隐匿哨兵

trans-unit.resname: USG·109 | Veiled Sentry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When one of your opponents successfully casts a spell, if CARDNAME is an enchantment, CARDNAME becomes a creature with power and toughness each equal to the total casting cost of that spell and that counts as an Illusion.
trans-unit.target: 当任一对手成功施放一个咒语，若CARDNAME此时为一结界，则CARDNAME成为力量与防御力均等同于该咒语之总施放费用，并视为虚影的生物。

trans-unit.source: Veiled Serpent
trans-unit.target: 隐匿巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: USG·110 | Veiled Serpent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When one of your opponents successfully casts a spell, if CARDNAME is an enchantment, CARDNAME becomes a 4/4 creature that cannot attack unless defending player controls an island and that counts as a Serpent.\nCycling o2 (You may pay o2 and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)
trans-unit.target: 当任一对手成功施放一个咒语，若CARDNAME此时为一结界，则CARDNAME成为4/4，除非防御玩家操控任何海岛，否则不能攻击，并视为巨蛇的生物。 循环2（你可以支付2，并从手上弃掉这张牌以抓一张牌。将此异能视为瞬间使用。）

trans-unit.source: Windfall
trans-unit.target: 横财

trans-unit.source: Each player discards his or her hand and draws cards equal to the greatest number a player discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: 每个玩家弃掉手牌，再抓数量等同于玩家中所弃最多手牌数的牌。

trans-unit.source: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."\n—Barrin, master wizard
trans-unit.target: 「要在脑袋中装满知识，我们必须先把脑袋清干净。」 ～法术大师巴林

trans-unit.source: Wizard Mentor
trans-unit.target: 法术教师

trans-unit.resname: USG·112 | Wizard Mentor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Return CARDNAME and target creature you control to owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: T：将法术导师与你所操控的目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Although some of the students quickly grasped the concept, the others could summon only blackboards.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有些学生很快便可掌握住要诀，但是有些学生却只能召唤出黑板。

trans-unit.source: Zephid
trans-unit.target: 塞菲德

trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: Once you've seen one, you'll understand why spells won't go near them.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你见过它，你就会了解为何咒语无法近它的身。

trans-unit.source: Zephid's Embrace
trans-unit.target: 塞菲德之拥

trans-unit.resname: USG·114 | Zephid's Embrace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, gains flying, and cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+2/+2，并获得飞行异能，且不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: Spells will shun you, as will everyone else.
trans-unit.target: 咒语会避开你，就像其他所有人一样。

trans-unit.source: Abyssal Horror
trans-unit.target: 深渊惊惧兽

trans-unit.resname: USG·115 | Abyssal Horror | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, target player chooses and discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，目标玩家选择弃掉两张牌。

trans-unit.source: It has no face of its own—it wears that of its latest victim.
trans-unit.target: 它并没有自己的脸，而是穿戴著前一个猎物的脸皮。

trans-unit.source: Befoul
trans-unit.target: 污损

trans-unit.source: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. A creature destroyed this way cannot be regenerated this turn.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地或非黑色生物。被消灭的生物此回合不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."\n—Radiant, archangel
trans-unit.target: 「这土地在它的碰触下腐坏，瞬间变成油状黑液。」 ～大天使蕾荻安

trans-unit.source: Bereavement
trans-unit.target: 如丧考妣

trans-unit.source: Whenever a green creature is put into a graveyard from play, its controller chooses and discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何绿色生物从场上置入坟墓场时，该生物的操控者选择弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Grief is as useless as love."\n—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor
trans-unit.target: 「悲痛就像爱情一样毫无意义。」 ～约格莫夫魔判官基克斯

trans-unit.source: Blood Vassal
trans-unit.target: 血之仆役

trans-unit.resname: USG·118 | Blood Vassal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add o\nBo\nB to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：加BB到你的法术力池中。将此异能视为法术力源使用。

trans-unit.source: "They are bred to suffer and born to die. Much like humans."\n—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor
trans-unit.target: 「他们天生注定受苦受难一辈子，就像人类一样。」 ～约格莫夫魔判官基克斯

trans-unit.source: Bog Raiders
trans-unit.target: 腐沼突击队

trans-unit.resname: USG·119s | Bog Raiders | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者（如果防御玩家操控任何沼泽，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: Breach
trans-unit.target: 突围

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. That creature cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。该生物此回合只能被神器生物或黑色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Cackling Fiend
trans-unit.target: 咳吼恶煞

trans-unit.resname: USG·121 | Cackling Fiend | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, each of your opponents chooses and discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你的每个对手均需选择弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.
trans-unit.target: 它的气管先用来扩大它暴怒狂笑的声音。

trans-unit.source: Carrion Beetles
trans-unit.target: 腐肉甲虫

trans-unit.resname: USG·122 | Carrion Beetles | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o2o\nB, oc\nT: Remove from the game up to three target cards in one graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 2B， T：从任一坟墓场中将最多三张目标牌移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: It's all fun and games until someone loses an eye.
trans-unit.target: 这本来只是因为好玩，不料后来有人弄瞎一只眼睛。

trans-unit.source: Contamination
trans-unit.target: 污化

trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, sacrifice a creature or sacrifice CARDNAME.\nWhenever a land is tapped for mana, it produces o\nB instead of its normal type and amount.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，牺牲一个生物否则牺牲CARDNAME。 每当任何地牌被横置以提供法术力时，该地产生B以取代原来的法术力类型和数量。

trans-unit.source: Corrupt

trans-unit.source: The first explorers found Argoth a storehouse of natural wealth—towering forests grown over rich veins of ore.
trans-unit.target: 首批探险者发现亚格斯是个自然资源的大宝库～上有高耸浓密的森林，下有蕴藏丰富的矿石。

trans-unit.source: Fecundity
trans-unit.target: 生机盎然

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, that creature's controller may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当任何生物从场上置入坟墓场时，该生物的操控者可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.
trans-unit.target: 生命是永恒的，而一生的时间却极为短暂。

trans-unit.source: Fertile Ground
trans-unit.target: 肥沃大地

trans-unit.resname: USG·252 | Fertile Ground | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, it produces an additional one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的地被横置以提供法术力时，它额外产生一点任一颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.source: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.
trans-unit.target: 这片森林茂盛之极，两兄弟要掠夺也难～只可惜未竟全功。

trans-unit.source: Fortitude
trans-unit.target: 刚毅

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, return CARDNAME to owner's hand.\nSacrifice a forest: Regenerate enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上。 牺牲一张树林：重生受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.source: Gaea's Bounty
trans-unit.target: 盖亚的恩赐

trans-unit.resname: USG·254 | Gaea's Bounty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to two forest cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your library afterward.
trans-unit.target: 自你的牌库中搜寻最多两张树林，将其展示后放入你手中。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The forest grew back so quickly that lumbering machines were suspended in the treetops.
trans-unit.target: 森林成长回来的速度极快，以至于伐木机在树梢忙得停不下来。

trans-unit.target: 盖亚之拥

trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+3/+3并获得践踏异能。 G：重生受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.source: The forest rose to the battle, not to save the people but to save itself.
trans-unit.target: 森林起而奋战，不只为了救人民，也为了救自己。

trans-unit.source: Gorilla Warrior
trans-unit.target: 大猩猩战士

trans-unit.source: The gorilla beat its chest and threw great handfuls of leaves into the air. It howled challenge and showed its teeth. The mechanical soldier, not understanding, simply killed it.
trans-unit.target: 大猩猩敲打著胸膛，将满手的树叶抛向天空，一边长嚎示威，露出森白的利齿。机械士兵根本看不懂它在干什么，便将它杀了。

trans-unit.source: Greater Good
trans-unit.target: 牺牲小我

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then choose and discard three cards.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：抓等同于被牺牲生物力量值的牌，再选择并弃掉三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "We have more sprouts than they have hands."\n—Gamelen, Citanul elder
trans-unit.target: 「我们的芽比他们的手还多。」 ～西坦努长老盖美伦

trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.target: 每天黄昏时，飞过天幕的鸟群总会特别安静。

trans-unit.source: It wants only to dress you in silk.

Treat these tokens as 1/1 green creatures.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, remove all fungus counters from all creatures.

trans-unit.target: 当风吹树林，仔细聆听枝干间的声响。如果你听到了你的名字，你便是女神的爱民。

trans-unit.target: 黄铜侏儒

trans-unit.source: o4, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Choose an artifact card in your hand and put that artifact into play.
trans-unit.target: 4，牺牲CARDNAME：选择你手上一张神器牌，并将之放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Start with eleven gnomes and a room of parts, and come morning you'll have ten and a monster the likes of which you've never seen.
trans-unit.target: 首先将十一个侏儒和一屋子的零件放在一起，等到第二天早上你会拥有十个侏儒和一个从没见过的怪物。

trans-unit.source: Crystal Chimes
trans-unit.target: 水晶钟铃

trans-unit.resname: USG·292 | Crystal Chimes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o3, oc\nT, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 3， T，牺牲CARDNAME：将所有结界牌从你的坟墓场中移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: As Serra was to learn, the peace and sanctity of her realm were as fragile as glass.
trans-unit.target: 撒拉直到此时才知道，她和平而圣洁的国度竟像是玻璃般地脆弱。

trans-unit.source: Dragon Blood
trans-unit.target: 龙血

trans-unit.resname: USG·293 | Dragon Blood | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o3, oc\nT: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 3， T：在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Fire in the blood, fire in the belly.
trans-unit.target: 热血中烧，激情似火。

trans-unit.source: Endoskeleton
trans-unit.target: 内骨骼

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap phase.\no2, oc\nT: Target creature gets +0/+3 as long as CARDNAME remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择在你的重置阶段中不重置CARDNAME。 2， T：只要CARDNAME持续被横置，目标生物便得到+0/+3。

trans-unit.source: Fluctuator
trans-unit.target: 波动机

trans-unit.source: Cycling costs you up to o2 less to play.
trans-unit.target: 你的循环费用最多减少2即可使用。

trans-unit.source: Fiko summoned only atogs for three straight sessions. The tutor couldn't decide whether to punish his failure or praise his consistency.
trans-unit.target: 菲可连续三个学期都只会召唤出阿托格。导师无法决定到底该责罚他的失误，还是夸赞他的一致性。

trans-unit.source: Grafted Skullcap
trans-unit.target: 移花帽

trans-unit.resname: USG·296 | Grafted Skullcap | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: During your draw phase, draw an additional card.\nAt the end of each of your turns, discard your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的抓牌阶段中，额外多抓一张牌。 在你每个回合结束时，弃掉你的手牌。

trans-unit.source: "Let go your mind. Mine is fitter."\n—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor
trans-unit.target: 「把你的心智放弃了吧。我的比较好。」 ～约格莫夫魔判官基克斯

trans-unit.source: Hopping Automaton
trans-unit.target: 跳跃机械兽

trans-unit.source: o0: CARDNAME gets -1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 0：CARDNAME得-1/-1并获得飞行异能，直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Designed to carry equipment across rivers, the hopping automaton was soon pressed into service in the infantry.
trans-unit.target: 设计上用来将货物载运过河的跳跃机械兽，很快的就广泛应用于部队中。

trans-unit.resname: USG·298 | Karn, Silver Golem | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.resname: USG·298 | Karn, Silver Golem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -4/+4 until end of turn.\no1: Target noncreature artifact is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its casting cost until end of turn. (That artifact retains its abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME进行阻挡或者被阻挡，它得-4/+4直到回合结束。 1：目标非生物的神器成为神器生物，其力量与防御力皆等同于其总施放费用，直到回合结束。（此神器仍保留原有异能）

trans-unit.source: Lifeline
trans-unit.target: 救生索

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard and a creature is in play, return that creature from your graveyard to play at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物被置入坟墓场，并且场上有任何生物，在回合结束时将该生物从坟墓场中放置进场。

trans-unit.source: During your upkeep, you may put a petal counter on CARDNAME.\noc\nT, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add X mana of one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of petal counters on CARDNAME. Play this ability as a mana source.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以放置一个花瓣指示物在CARDNAME上。 T，牺牲CARDNAME：加X点同一种颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中，X为CARDNAME其上花瓣指示物的数量。将此异能视为法术力源使用。

trans-unit.source: Metrognome
trans-unit.target: 侏儒节拍器

trans-unit.source: When a spell or ability one of your opponents controls causes you to discard CARDNAME, put four Gnome tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 artifact creatures.\no4, oc\nT: Put a Gnome token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature.
trans-unit.target: 当任一对手所操控的咒语或异能使得你弃掉CARDNAME时，放置四个侏儒衍生物进场。将这些衍生物视为1/1的神器生物。 4， T：放置一个侏儒衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为1/1的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: o\nX, oc\nT: Tap X lands.
trans-unit.target: X， T：横置X张地。

trans-unit.source: The helix was the finest example of Mishra's campaign strategy: if he couldn't have Argoth, no one could.
trans-unit.target: 这螺旋柱是米斯拉战争策略的最佳例证：若是他没办法得到亚格斯，别人也没办法得到。

trans-unit.source: Mobile Fort

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME counts as a Wall. (Walls cannot attack.)\no3: CARDNAME gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it were not a Wall. Play this ability only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 将CARDNAME视为墙。（墙不可攻击。） 3：CARDNAME得+3/-1直到回合结束，并且在此回合可以像不是墙一般地攻击。此异能一回合只能使用一次。

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME在你的重置阶段中不可重置。 支付8点生命：重置CARDNAME。 CARDNAME不可被少于三个生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Yotian soldiers were designed to fight, not watch their feet.

trans-unit.source: Smokestack

trans-unit.target: 在你的维持阶段中，你可以放置一个油烟指示物在CARDNAME上。 在每一玩家的维持阶段中，CARDNAME上每有一个油烟指示物，该玩家就必须牺牲一个永久物。

trans-unit.target: 5， T：洗你的牌库，并且展示最顶上的牌。直到回合结束，只要该牌持续留在你牌库顶上，你可以将之视为如同是在你手上一般地使用，并且不须支付施放费用。（若该咒语的施放费用中有X，则X为0。）

trans-unit.source: When Urza asked the viashino what it did, they answered: "It hums."
trans-unit.target: 当克撒向凡尔西诺们询问它的功能时，他们答道：「它只会嗡嗡叫。」

trans-unit.source: It was the explorers' only tether to reality.
trans-unit.target: 这是唯一将探险家们系留于现实世界的东西。
